results.content: It's fine. But little suggestion - the quality of sound might be much better. Except this, I have no objections.

results.content:
Great course, I learned more than those YouTube videos. A lot of great information and I learned a lot. 

But... The audio quality is poor, if you try to run at 2x, it's not clear at all, sometimes there's a lot of static.

And... I think that there's more to cover, like user authorization and authentication, and other real world examples.
results.content_html:

And... I think that there's more to cover, like user authorization and authentication, and other real world examples.

results.content: The audio quality is terrible, as is the quality of the video. The course content is good, but the Web filtering could have been more in depth. All in all an OK course and good for a beginner.
results.content_html: The audio quality is terrible, as is the quality of the video. The course content is good, but the Web filtering could have been more in depth. All in all an OK course and good for a beginner.

results.content: It's a little hard to understand over the thick accent but as the lessons progressed, I got used to that. It's a very informative course with lots to learn.
results.content_html: It's a little hard to understand over the thick accent but as the lessons progressed, I got used to that. It's a very informative course with lots to learn.

results.content: I had SOAP web services. It seemed more simple to me when I worked with it.  Restful is more difficult to grasp. The instructor does not tell what he's showing is for (or purpose or application). He speaks monotonously.  Good thing this course was bought for me as a gift.  Because I would not have paid all this money for this poor taught course. Please improve it asap.
